title: Drawing, "Recto and Verso: Studies of Dahlias", early 20th century
medium: Brush and watercolor on white paper
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 53
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Vertical sheet depicting studies of dahlias.  The recto has two yellow dahlias at right and two pink dahlias at left.  The verso contains one red dahlia.
